CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 13, 1971, page 23 reads: "RECEIVING LINE - Wearing her gorgeous inaugural gown, a Malcolme Starr original, the Hon. C DeLores Tucker, Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, stands in receiving line at the recent reception given in her honor by the Women's Auxiliary of the Pittsburgh Branch NAACP. Held in the Terrace Room of the William Penn Hotel, from the left to right: Mrs. Delores Stanton, chairman of the reception; Atty. Byrd R. Brown, President of the Pittsburgh NAACP; Phil Savage, Tri-state Director of NAACP; William Tucker, husband of honoree; the Hon. Mrs. Tucker, Mrs. Mary Gloster, President of Women's Auxiliary; Mrs. Homer S. Brown, State-wide Vice President of NAACP; the Rev. Dr. Leroy Patrick and Roland Hayes, Vice President of Pittsburgh Chapter."
TitMainTitle: Receiving line at Women's Auxiliary of Pittsburgh NAACP honoring C. DeLores Tucker, Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania at William Penn Hotel, including Byrd Brown, second from left, Phil Savage, Bill Tucker, C. DeLores Tucker, Mary Gloster, Mrs. Homer S. Brown, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, and Roland Matthers, standing in front of platform with podium.
